titles.title: Taiwan Self-Defense Act of 1997
To amend the Taiwan Relations Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Asia and the Pacific.

bill.summary: 1/7/1997--Introduced. Taiwan Self-Defense Act of 1997 - Amends the Taiwan Relations Act to declare that the Joint Communique of the United States and China of August 17, 1982, is superseded by the U.S. policy of making defense articles and defense services available to Taiwan in quantities necessary to enable Taiwan to maintain a sufficient self-defense capability.
